title: Chinese Man - Discography (2007-2011)

-------------------------------------
Chinese Man - Discography (2007-2011)
-------------------------------------

Chinese Man, signed by the label Chinese Man records, is a French hip-hop collective formed in 2004. Its main influences are funk, dub, reggae and jazz. The label Chinese Man Records is based in Aix-en-Provence.
